translation: He paid homage to the great vast Buddha Flower Ornament Sutra, the original honored one of the Huazang world ocean, Virūḍhaka, in all the ten directions, and gave his life, extinguished his sins, increased his pure faith, and wished to be born in the Huazang ocean, in the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss, as the sūtra says.

translation: May we all sentient beings be born in the Huazang ocean. In the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss, the chief water spirit in the enlightenment site of the bodhisattva in the Dharma realm next, Namo attains the liberation gate of compassion that benefits all sentient beings equally.
Their number is countless.
The chief water spirit of all [sentient beings].

translation: May we all sentient beings be born in the Huazang Ocean. In the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss, the chief sea deity in the middle of the enlightenment path of the Dharma realm, the chief sea deity, Namo, has the ability to equip all sentient beings with the merit of the ocean of treasures that adorn his body and liberate them.

translation: May we all sentient beings be born in the Huazang Ocean. In the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss, the chief river god in the site of the next bodhi path in the Dharma realm, Nan Mou, has the ability to rain an infinite Dharma rain of liberation, to produce a swift flow of water, and to make all sentient beings permanently free of affliction, and to cleanse springs and rivers, Nan Mou, has the ability to skillfully cleanse all sentient beings of the dust and defilement of affliction, and to free them from the dust and pure eyes, Nan Mou, has the ability to constantly produce the voice of liberation that benefits sentient beings, and to roar universally in ten directions, Nan Mou, has the ability to constantly produce unharming kindness in all contained consciousnesses, and to liberate sentient beings, and to aid them.
Their number is countless.
All of them are chief river spirits.

translation: May we all sentient beings be born in the Huazang ocean. In the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss, in the next place of enlightenment in the Dharma realm, Lord Cārāṇasamitra has the ability to give all sentient beings a taste of the Dharma that will lead to the accomplishment of the Buddha's body.

translation: May we all sentient beings be born in the Huazang ocean. In the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss, the chief medicine spirit in the middle of the next bodhi path in the Dharma realm is Namo, who can universally observe the minds of all sentient beings and diligently gather them in.
